It translation previous research do mouse study effect function certain key enzyme involve lipid metabolism find associated insulin resistance . These enzyme fatty acid synthase ( FAS ) , choline/ethanolamine phosphotransferase 1 ( CEPT1 ) sarcoplasmic-endoplasmic reticulum ATPase ( SERCA ) . Based investigator research , appear activity function enzymes determines ratio certain phospholipid sarcoplasmic reticulum ( SR ) , namely phosphatidylethanolamine ( PE ) phosphatidylcholine ( PC ) . Furthermore , investigator find ratio phospholipid correlate mouse 's sensitivity insulin . Based muscle biopsy four healthy person , find human muscle contains similar phospholipid phospholipid ratio mouse . It hypothesize phospholipid signature may predictive metabolic status human well . The specific aim study determine composition function sarcoplasmic reticulum alter person metabolic syndrome compare lean control . This knowledge could provide new understanding impediment effective therapy , novel biomarkers disease progression , innovative treatment target diabetes .
DOC.criteria: Control subject Inclusion : < 15 min exercise per day , < 2 day per week Age > 18 < 65 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 25 Healthy physical exam ( patient devoid major acute chronic illness ) No significant abnormality screen labs Exclusion : Currently significant prescription medication oral contraceptive woman Currently Pregnant Current Tobacco Use Subjects Metabolic Syndrome Inclusion : < 15 min exercise per day , < 2 day per week Age > 18 < 65 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 30 Meet least three follow Adult Treatment Panel ( ATP ) III criterion metabolic syndrome : waist circumference > = 40 inch men , > = 35 inch woman blood triglyceride > = 150 mg/dL blood HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL men , < 50 woman blood pressure > = 130 mmHg systolic , > = 85 mmHg diastolic fasting blood sugar > = 100 mg/dL Exclusion : Diagnosed Type 2 diabetes , coronary artery disease , cancer , liver , lung , kidney disease major illness Currently significant prescription medication : oral contraceptive woman More two standard medication stage 1 hypertension men woman ( blood pressure 140159/9099 ) Currently Pregnant Current Tobacco Use
